body.name: RCA RPJ136 Home Theater Projector - 1080P Compatible -(Renewed)
features: SUPERIOR WATCHING EXPERIENCE: Powered by mstar advanced color Engine. 2019 upgraded LED lighting provides +60% brightness than ordinary projector. Supporting 1920x1080 resolution which is ideal for home entertainment. Not recommend for powerpoint or other office presentation

LARGE SCREEN SIZE EXPERIENCE: It provides a watching size from 32” to 170” with the projection distance between 4. 9ft to 16. 4ft. A projection distance of about 6. 5 ft is the recommended viewing distance

MULTIMEDIA PORTABLE PROJECTOR: Great for playing videos, watching TV series, football matches, photos sharing etc. It can be easily connected with your smartphone, PS3, PS4, Xbox one or Wii to enjoy big games.

FULLY EQUIPPED: HDMI, VGA, AV, USB interfaces, The projector is compatible with TV box, TV stick, PCs, laptops, tablets, USB flash drive, media players. Multipurpose—home theater, video game, party, outdoor activities

Inputs: HDMI /AV/ USB /VGA/Micro-SD card Supported video formats:MPEG1 / MPEG2 / MPEG4 / RM / AVI / RMVB / MOV / M PEG / DIVX /VOB. Supported audio formats: MP3 / WMA. Supported picture formats: JPG / BMP / PNG
body.description: View your favorite movies and TV shows on the big screen with this RCA home theatre projector. It projects onto any flat surface and delivers a screen size from 30" all the way up to a 130" for an immersive viewing experience. It boasts two HDMI ports so you can easily connect gaming consoles, Blu-ray players, streaming devices, and more. 480p resolution, but supports 1080p with HDMI connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Fantastic Deal at $30
reviews.reviewText: Are you looking for a cheap projector that will provide you with a decent viewing experience? Especially something where if it were to break, you're not out an arm and a leg? This is a fantastic option for exactly that!We ordered two projectors, this one, and another new projector that is under $100. We wanted to be able to test the differences between them, but also to have one permanently installed, while one we could take with us to various settings. Set up side by side, we were able to test a couple of different things, and this is what we found:-This projector was not quite as bright as the other projector it was tested against. However, it was still plenty bright and was able to be clearly seen, even in a room that had normal blinds drawn during the middle of the day, so plenty of ambient light that could make it difficult to see.-The image quality was okay, good enough for most casual viewing. It is a native 480p projector, so while it can upscale to 720p, it will be limited somewhat. Colors within the images were fine, though I wouldn't necessarily say great.-This projector had decent volume, but sound quality is not the best. It will certainly do the job when watching a tv show, but if you want more richness in the sound quality, you'll want to look at some extra speakers.-Decent amount of adjustability! The projector we compared this to did not come with any ability to zoom or do any keystone corrections, so when this one allowed us to use different angles for projection, it definitely was a win. I did notice though that the edges of the images could be a little fuzzy even when the center of the screen was focused correctly.-Lastly, the fan certainly isn't the quietest. It's not loud enough to completely take away from whatever you are watching, so long as your volume is high enough. However, if you do listen for it, it'll still be noticeable, probably more so the closer to the actual projector you are.Long story short? Really can't go wrong with this projector at this price point. Definitely not going to be the best viewing experience you've ever had. But being able to get a big screen picture at this price? Definitely worth it. For the price per performance ratio, I'm giving this five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pleased with this projector!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Was honestly a bit skeptical of this projector. Considering the old saying "you get what you pay for." Well, I got more than I paid for. This is a cheap, yet nice projector. Works okay in somewhat light rooms. But really looks good in a dark room. It's light, easy to travel with. Has a remote control. Has a good ount of inputs for whatever you wanna play on it. The projector has a built in speaker. Is the speaker the best? No, no it isn't. However..it is decent. Especially for the price! I've hooked up my Blu ray player, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X to it. And have even used it for a job! As an artist, I sometimes look for a way to easily do big jobs. I've been doing art for a barbershop in town. And decided to put the draft drawing onto an SD card. Then prohect it onto the wall. To ensure the lettering etc..is how I want it to be in size etc..Worked really well. I recommend this projector if you want a good one for a cheap price! And RCA is a well known, historic brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does what’s needed
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s not the best on quality, the sound is good and it’s easy to set up. I suggest buying a projector stand with it.So I’ve had it little over a year and I find you have to place it close to wall to have a clear projection, I’ve had to turn mine (upside down) and use flip option in menu to minimize the blurry view. About 3ft away from wall gave me a good view.I absolutely love that I can use it for various projects and it connects to almost every device.Is it worth the money?HELL YEAHWould I recommend?Yeah i guess

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price but worth spending a little more for better picture
reviews.reviewText: I am still trying to get it perfect but not there yet. The image is not as bright as I would like. The projector needs to be "close" to the wall to have a clear picture. Not many option to focus the picture. One knob is to focus. The other is for the skew (not what it is called but it changes the rectangle image shape).On the other hand, I love that it was two HDMI inputs (which is why I bought it in the first place). The speaker isn't that great so I'm happy it has an audio output jack which I can connect to an external speaker. It worked good enough for us to watch Hamilton and a movie.As mentioned before, I am still working perfecting the projected image but as of now, it's either blurry on top and clear on lower. or clear on top and blurry on bottom. It might be how I have the projector positioned.
Trabaja perfectamente y es fácil de usar.Excelente por calidad y precio

Bought this to project pumpkin faces onto real pumpkins to look like they are singing. Plugged a separate USB drive with the MP4 File and played no problem. I don’t know why others are saying the sounds too low because mine was extremely loud. Also comes with an auxiliary outlet so you can plug in a separate speaker. AMAZING PRODUCT!

You really do get what you pay for on Amazon, not in a bad way. I was looking for a cheap projector for movie nights. I’m the kind of person that loves cheap things, but still expects good quality. And I got it. Picture could be better, sound could be better (I just use speakers, sound is fine otherwise!) I can’t seem to get the screen perfectly straight, and the right corners are blurry. But it’s great otherwise !! Love it ❤️

reviews.reviewTitle: Buen producto aunque llegó sucio y le faltaba una gomita de las patas.
reviews.reviewText: Un muy buen producto para su precio, ligero, con buena imagen, unas bocinas con buen volumen y un sonido bonito (siempre tomando en cuenta su precio).Tiene salidas VGA, USB y HDMI, el ventilador hace menos ruido que otros proyectores de esta misma gama, pero aún así se escucha.No le doy 5 estrellas porque llegó sucio, todas las salidas tenían bastante polvo, algunas partes de la carcasa y el control tenían dulce (o algo así pegajoso de colores) Ojalá le llamen la atención a la persona encargada de limpiar estos productos antes de venderlos.Le faltaba una gomita en las patas pero eso es fácil de arreglar.

Super recomendado, tenía mis dudas si serviría o no pero llego muy bien, la caja si venia super maltratada y con cinta por todas partes pero lo que realmente importa es lo de adentro es completamente funcional, tiene buena calidad respecto al precio, único detalle la tapa se sale con facilidad pero fuera de eso super recomendado
